import React from 'react' import { useState} from 'react' const AddTask = ({onAdd}) => { const [text,setText] = useState('') const [day, setDay] = useState('') const [reminder, setReminder] = useState(false) return(
setText(e.target.value)}/>
setDay(e.target.value)}/>
setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)}/>
) } export default AddTask
